subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: A dependency directive is used to override merlin's auto-assembly semantics by declaring a relative path to a component that should be used as the service provider.

tr.td: The relative path to the component to use as the service provider.

subsection.name: Sample XML
subsection.source:
<container name="tutorial">
<classloader> <classpath> <repository> <resource id="avalon-framework:avalon-framework-impl" version="4.1.5"/> </repository> </classpath> </classloader>
<component name="gloria" class="tutorial.IdentifiableComponent"/> <component name="nancy" class="tutorial.IdentifiableComponent"/>
<component name="hello" class="tutorial.HelloComponent"> <dependencies> <dependency key="primary" source="gloria"/> <dependency key="secondary" source="nancy"/> </dependencies> </component>
</container>
